name: GoblinAmerica
summary:
GoblinAmerica is a fast-moded gun-style game set in a low-level gunkjuiced America.

As a solar goblin, you will possess myriad past, present, and future presidents at the worst moments in their lives, then set things right with a collection of startling guns, hats, beliefs, shoes, and creams. Will you safeguard the divinely-ordered existence of the Yellow Sun? Or will you allow the Verminstar’s disordered swamp to chew this world back into formlessness?
